entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
